episodesJson.title: New role of freshmen Congressmen
episodesJson.description: The New Role of Freshmen Congressmen, in the 90th Congress. Guests: United States Representative Howard W. Pollock, R-Alaska; United States Representative Jerry L. Pettis, R-California.

creator.name: National Association of Educational Broadcasters, WAMU-FM (Radio station : Washington, D.C.)
